app.title: VistoCloud - Mortgage Application Platform
app.name: VistoCloud
app.subtitle: Modern mortgage application processing platform. Collect, validate, and process applications with AI-powered assistance and real-time collaboration.

toast.applicationCreatedDescription: You can now start filling out the application form.

address.formerAddressesRequired: You must provide former addresses (less than 24 months at current address)

address.mustAddFormerAddress: You must add at least one former address (less than 24 months at current address)

employment.noRecordsDescription: Add employment history for the past 2 years

realEstate.noRecordsDescription: Add properties you currently own or have recently sold

loanInfo.interestRateDescription: Approximate or desired interest rate (as a percentage)
loanInfo.downPaymentDescription: The amount of down payment for purchase loans
loanInfo.downPaymentSourcePlaceholder: e.g., Personal savings, Gift from family, etc.
loanInfo.downPaymentSourceDescription: Source of the down payment funds
loanInfo.propertyUseTypeDescription: How the property will be used

hero.title:
Build 1003s faster.
Answer overlays instantly.
hero.subtitle: Streamline borrower intake with AI-powered forms and get instant, cited answers to complex underwriting questions, all in one platform.

home.trustedBy: Trusted by modern lenders and broker networks

products.title: Everything mortgage teams need to move faster
products.subtitle: Whether you're collecting borrower data or answering underwriting questions, we've built the tools that save hours every week.

applicationGenerator.title: 1003 Application Generator
applicationGenerator.subtitle: Streamline borrower intake
applicationGenerator.description: Collect, validate, and export mortgage applications in minutesâ€”not hours. Voice dictation, auto-save, and MISMO 3.4 export built in.

features.workflow: Multi-step guided workflow for client info, employment, income, assets, and documents
features.dictation: AI-powered voice dictation to capture borrower scenarios quickly
features.validation: Real-time validation and auto-saveâ€”never lose progress
features.export: Export to MISMO 3.4 XML for seamless LOS integration
features.multiClient: Multi-client support for borrowers and co-borrowers

aiCopilot.title: AI Guideline Copilot
aiCopilot.subtitle: Answer overlay questions instantly
aiCopilot.description: Get cited, overlay-aware answers to underwriting questions in seconds. Compare programs side-by-side with your org's internal policies respected.

features.overlayAware: Overlay-aware responses that blend agency guidelines with your internal rules
features.comparisons: Cross-program comparisons: FHA, VA, USDA, Conventional, and Non-QM in one view
features.citations: Source-linked citations for every answerâ€”click through to handbooks instantly
features.history: Conversation history with search, favorites, and excerpts
features.intelligence: Vertex AI-powered intelligence that learns your org's most common questions

benefits.title: Work smarter, not harder
benefits.subtitle: Mortgage professionals spend too much time on manual tasks. We built VistoCloud to give that time back.

saveTime.title: Save hours every week
saveTime.body: Stop switching between PDFs, spreadsheets, and LOS systems. Everything you need lives in one workspace that auto-saves and validates as you go.

reduceErrors.title: Reduce errors by 60%+
reduceErrors.body: Real-time validation catches missing fields and inconsistencies before submission. MISMO compliance built-in means fewer rejections from lenders.

answerQuestions.title: Answer questions in seconds
answerQuestions.body: No more digging through 500-page handbooks. Ask natural-language questions and get cited answers that respect your overlays automatically.

scale.title: Scale without hiring
scale.body: Handle more applications and questions with the same team. Voice dictation and AI copilot let processors and underwriters work faster.

howItWorks.title: From borrower intake to submission in three steps

step1.title: Collect borrower data
step1.body: Use our guided 1003 workflow or voice dictation to capture client information, employment history, income, assets, and required documents. Everything auto-saves to Firebase.

step2.title: Ask overlay questions
step2.body: Type natural-language questions about guidelines, scenarios, or program comparisons. Our AI copilot surfaces cited answers that blend agency rules with your org's overlays.

step3.title: Export and submit
step3.body: Review your application, validate against MISMO requirements, and export to XML. Share cited answers from the copilot with processors and compliance teams.

testimonials.title: Teams feel the impact immediately
testimonials.subtitle: Mortgage professionals across the country are using VistoCloud to work faster and reduce errors.

testimonial1.quote: We cut application processing time from 2 hours to 20 minutes. The voice dictation feature alone saves our processors 30 minutes per file.
testimonial1.author: Operations Manager

testimonial2.quote: MortgageGuidesAI helped our underwriting desk reduce clarification emails by 42%. The compare view is incredibly helpful when we run "what if" scenarios.
testimonial2.author: Director of Credit Policy

testimonial3.quote: Overlay management used to live in PDFs on a shared drive. Now every answer respects our overlays automaticallyâ€”huge win for compliance.
testimonial3.author: VP of Operations

testimonial4.quote: MISMO export works flawlessly with our LOS. No more manual data entry or formatting errors. Our submission rate improved immediately.
testimonial4.author: Loan Officer

aiNetwork.title: Built for overlay-heavy orgs and cross-program scenarios
aiNetwork.subtitle: MortgageGuidesAI fuses agency guidelines with your overlays, then calls Vertex AI to deliver contextual answers across every product line.

features.compare: Compare FHA, VA, USDA, Conventional, and Non-QM eligibility in a single response.
features.toggle: Quickly toggle overlays on/off to see the delta between investor guidance and your internal policy.
features.share: Share cited answers with processors and compliance directly from the portal.

finalCta.title: Launch in days, not months
finalCta.subtitle: Connect your Firebase project, drop in org overlays, and start generating 1003s and answering overlay questions today. No lengthy onboarding required.

applications.subtitle: View and manage all mortgage applications
